verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> or Song <WH7892> for the sons <WH1121> of Korah <WH7141>. His foundation <WH3248> is in the holy <WH6944> mountains <WH2042>. for the sons: or, of the sons
The LORD <WH3068> loveth <WH157> the gates <WH8179> of Zion <WH6726> more than all the dwellings <WH4908> of Jacob <WH3290>.
Glorious things <WH3513> are spoken <WH1696> of thee, O city <WH5892> of God <WH430>. Selah <WH5542>.

I will make mention <WH2142> of Rahab <WH7294> and Babylon <WH894> to them that know <WH3045> me: behold Philistia <WH6429>, and Tyre <WH6865>, with Ethiopia <WH3568>; this man was born <WH3205> there.
And of Zion <WH6726> it shall be said <WH559>, This and that man <WH376> was born <WH3205> in her: and the highest <WH5945> himself shall establish <WH3559> her.
The LORD <WH3068> shall count <WH5608>, when he writeth up <WH3789> the people <WH5971>, that this man was born <WH3205> there. Selah <WH5542>.
As well the singers <WH7891> as the players <WH2490> on instruments shall be there: all my springs <WH4599> are in thee.
